title: Was there an update today for anyone else?
body: The game prompted me to restart for an update, however this screwed up my entire game. The camera doesnt work right, my abilities quick cast even though I turned it back off, my settings reset themselves. Just...everything pooped at once

replies.body: The [**Status Page **](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)mentioned server-side settings being temporarily disabled while the devs worked on some things. Having those persisted settings disabled is why yours reverted to defaults.
